frozen_definition.name: StudyStack
frozen_definition.signal_source: Learning app research shows students 'forget everything during exam' due to cramming, need better retention without complexity
frozen_definition.description: Micro-review app that converts any study material into 30-second daily review sessions with adaptive timing
frozen_definition.target_user: Students who want better retention but find traditional spaced repetition apps too complex or time-consuming
frozen_definition.pain_point_evidence: Students report cramming 'makes you exhausted and forget everything during exam'
core_loop: Capture study material with camera or notes
frozen_definition.differentiation: Micro-review format vs. lengthy study sessions, adaptive without complex setup
frozen_definition.subscription_fit: Premium includes unlimited material, cross-device sync, and detailed analytics

pricing.trial_strategy: Free for 10 review items, premium for unlimited and analytics
